short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add contact data from websites and linkedin to your ProspectSafari account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your B2B lead generation & save hours of copy & paste data entry to your ProspectSafari CRM.

Right-click on any name, phone number or email  in any website to add them as contact data in ProspectSafari.

- If the website domain is matched to an existing prospect then contact details will be added to that record. 

- If the website domain is not recognised then contact details can be added to the current prospect in ProspectSafari or a new prospect can be added to the default list.

Click on the ProspectSafari icon in the browser bar to modify the default list.

Similarly, right click on a contact profile in Linkedin to add the contact name, role and Linkedin url to ProspectSafari.

- If the Linkedin url is matched to an existing contact then those details are updated. If not, a new contact is added to the current prospect or a new prospect is added to the default list.

If you have integrated your ProspectSafari account to Hubspot then this extension will;

  * Instantly add captured data from websites or Linkedin to Hubspot
  * Add new contacts to Hubspot in a few clicks
